name: Unliving Rage
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Advanced Class Guide © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as rage, except it affects only undead creatures and bolsters them with necromantic energy rather than emotion. Each affected creature gains a +2 profane bonus to Strength and Charisma, a +1 profane bonus on Will saves, and a –2 penalty to AC. The effect is otherwise identical to a barbarian's rage.
target_zh: 每三个等级一个自愿的不死生物，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同狂暴术（Rage）一般，不过它仅能影响不死生物，而且使用死灵术的能量驱使它们而非依靠情绪。每个受影响的生物都会在力量和魅力上获得+2亵渎加值，意志豁免获得+1亵渎加值，并且AC受到-2减值。该效果在其他方面和野蛮人的狂暴相同。
